tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_text VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    signature_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (signature_id) REFERENCES signatures(signature_id)
);

CREATE TABLE forensics_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(50),
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    analyzed_data JSON,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trends_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT REFERENCES forensics_reports(report_id),
    signature_id INT REFERENCES signature_data(signature_id),
    trend_score FLOAT,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE signature_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signature_id INT REFERENCES signature_data(signature_id),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    signature_id INT NOT NULL,
    signer_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
